text: Imre András Pozsgay (26 November 1933 – 25 March 2016) was a Hungarian Communist politician. He played a key role in Hungary's fight for democracy after 1988. He served as Minister of Culture (1976–1980), Minister of Education (1980–1982) and Minister of State (1988–1990). He was also a Member of Parliament from 1983 to 1994. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Hungarian politicians Category:Hungarian educators Category:Hungarian communists
title: Imre Pozsgay
